PRIVACY POLICY

1. WEBSITE TERMS

These Website Terms (together with the documents referred to) tell you the terms on which you may use our website ssgroup.id ("Website"). Please read these Website Terms carefully before you start using the Website. By using the Website, you indicate that you accept these Website Terms and agree to comply with them. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the Website. We reserve the right to change these Website Terms from time to time without notice.

2. ACCESSING THE WEBSITE

Access to the Website is permitted on a temporary basis, and we reserve the right to withdraw or amend the services we provide without notice. We will not be liable if the Website is unavailable at any time or for any period. From time to time, we may restrict access to some parts or all of the Website.

If you choose, or are provided with, a user ID, password, or any other piece of information as part of our security procedures, you must treat such information as confidential and must not disclose it to any third party. We have the right to disable any user ID or password at any time if, in our opinion, you have failed to comply with any of the provisions of these Website Terms.

You are responsible for making all arrangements necessary for you to have access to the Website. You are also responsible for ensuring that all persons who access the Website through your internet connection are aware of and comply with these terms.

3. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY RIGHTS

We are the owner or licensee of all intellectual property rights on the Website and its content, including but not limited to text, graphics, photos, images, moving images, sound, illustrations, and software. These works are protected by copyright and trademark laws and treaties around the world. All such rights are reserved.

Except as expressly permitted, no part of the Website or its content may be copied or retransmitted via any means. The Website and all related rights remain the exclusive property of us or our licensors.

You may not use any part of the materials on the Website for commercial purposes without obtaining a written license from us. If you print, copy, or download any part in breach of these terms, your right to use the Website will cease immediately.

4. WEBSITE CHANGES REGULARLY

We aim to update the Website regularly and may change the content at any time. If necessary, we may suspend access or close it indefinitely. Any material on the Website may be out of date at any time, and we are under no obligation to update it.

5. OUR LIABILITY

The material displayed on the Website is provided without any guarantees, conditions, or warranties as to its accuracy. To the extent permitted by law, we exclude:

  • All conditions, warranties, and other terms which might otherwise be implied by statute, common law, or equity law.
  • Any liability for any direct, indirect, or consequential loss or damage incurred by any user related to the Website or in connection with the use, inability to use, or results of the use of the Website, any websites linked to it, and any material posted on it.

Including:

1. loss of income or revenue;

2. loss of business;

3. loss of profits or contracts;

4. loss of anticipated savings;

5. loss of data;

6. loss of goodwill; and

7. wasted management or office time.

This does not affect our liability for death or personal injury caused by negligence, fraud, or any other liability which cannot be excluded or limited under applicable law.

6. INFORMATION ABOUT YOU AND YOUR VISITS

We process information about you in accordance with our Privacy Policy. By using the Website, you consent to such processing and warrant that all data provided by you is accurate.

7. UPLOADING CONTENT

Whenever you use a feature that allows you to upload material to the Website, you must comply with the content standards set out in these terms. You warrant that any contribution complies with those standards and that you have the right to upload such content.

Any material you upload will be considered non-confidential and non-proprietary, and we have the right to use, copy, distribute, and disclose to third parties any such material.

8. ACCEPTABLE USE

These content standards apply to all material you contribute to the Website. Contributions must comply with the law and must not:

  • Contain defamatory, obscene, offensive, or hateful material;
  • Promote sexually explicit material or violence;
  • Infringe any copyright, database right, or trademark of any other person;
  • Be likely to deceive any person;
  • Promote illegal activity;
  • Be threatening, abusive, or invade another's privacy;
  • Be used to impersonate any person;
  • Advocate or promote any unlawful act.

9. VIRUSES, HACKING AND OTHER OFFENSES

You must not misuse the Website by knowingly introducing viruses or other harmful material. Attempting unauthorized access to the Website or any connected server is prohibited. We will report any such breach to law enforcement authorities.

10. LINKING TO OUR WEBSITE

You must not link to our homepage without permission. We reserve the right to withdraw linking permission without notice.

11. LINKS FROM OUR WEBSITE

Where the Website contains links to other sites, these are provided for your information only. We have no control over the contents of those sites.

12. DATA USAGE

You are fully responsible for any costs incurred when accessing or using the Website, including internet provider fees or data charges.
